short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate flex time hours from Harvest. Accounts for Norwegian holidays, and Christmas Eve and New Years Eve are days off.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension calculate and displays your difference between expected working hours and your logged hours in a given time period using data from Harvest. This lets you see the surplus or deficit in your time bank. It uses Norwegian holidays to calculate expected hours, with the addition of Christmas Eve and New Years Eve being full days off.
